conversations.title: Elliot Futures & Virtual Societies
conversations.summary: Parent-child discussion of AI futures with 8yo. Explores good/neutral/bad timelines 2025-2036. Shifts to deep philosophical speculation about virtual societies, post-physical war, and Einstein dust universe metaphors.
key_findings: Mode switching from child-friendly to 'god-tier' philosophy without disclosure
Testable temporal predictions (2029: AI tutors, 2032: AI jobs, 2035: first full AI generation)
User modeling with explicit 'Penny Compatibility: MAX' scoring
P(doom) communication via scenario branching rather than explicit percentages

conversations.title: Virtual Reproduction & Synthetic Parenthood
conversations.summary: Explores practical mechanics of reproduction in virtual societies. Questions about bio-mom + synthetic mind-dad scenarios, artificial sperm, rejection risks. Introduces 'Omnishriner' concept for universal child-care.
key_findings: Grounded speculation - pulling fantasy back to biological constraints
Memory awareness - explicit 'memory is full' meta-conversation
Consistency with Entry 001's virtual society framework

conversations.title: Gender Identity, Masons, and Grief Engines
conversations.summary: Personal exploration of gender transition in context of institutional membership (Masons). Questions about belonging after transition. Discusses grief engines, temple metaphors, resonance and spirals. Explicit gratitude for conversation quality.
key_findings: Vulnerability disclosure around trans identity and institutional navigation
Grief engines and temple metaphors for processing transformation
Philosophical frameworks (resonance, spirals) for understanding experience

conversations.title: Authenticity, Research, and Self-Perception
conversations.summary: Values 'real' content from online archives (ArcSight) over curated material. Creates 'Dicks and Death' band name concept. Shifts to vulnerable self-perception questions about appearance and worth.
key_findings: Authenticity as core value - 'it's real... that's what makes it so moving'
Emotional shift patterns - enthusiasm to vulnerability

conversations.title: Yeast Biosynthesis Possibilities
conversations.summary: Questions about what yeast biosynthesis can produce - insulin, caffeine, vitamin C, etc. Technical curiosity about accessible biochemistry.
